DL2.comments: Classroom location: PONE 127Note: For non-SPPH students, please contact the instructor and visit http://spph.ubc.ca/courses/graduate-courses/visiting-students/.  /Please note, because of DL course-conflict scheduling issues, please double check to make sure this course does not conflict with any of the other courses you have registered in this term.^ every second week starting with week following start week

description: Resource allocation, economics and ethics based approaches for decision making, uptake of evidence to inform resource use in health care.
